name: Rice
description: A staple cereal crop grown in warm, humid conditions and flooded fields.

name: Wheat
description: A major cereal crop grown in cool weather, used for flour and food products.

name: Maize
description: A versatile cereal crop used for food, feed, and industrial products.

name: Barley
description: A hardy cereal crop grown in cool climates, used for food and malt.

name: Jowar
description: A drought-tolerant millet crop grown in semi-arid regions.

name: Pearl Millet
description: A drought-resistant millet grown in hot and dry conditions.

name: Finger Millet
description: A nutritious millet crop rich in calcium and grown in rainfed areas.

name: Oats
description: A cool-season cereal used for food and fodder, popular for healthy diets.

name: Rye
description: A cold-tolerant cereal crop grown in cooler climates and poor soils.

name: Foxtail Millet
description: A short-duration millet crop suitable for dryland farming.

name: Chickpea
description: A protein-rich pulse crop grown in cool, dry seasons.

name: Pigeon Pea
description: A major pulse crop grown in warm climates, improves soil fertility.

name: Green Gram
description: A short-duration pulse crop grown in summer and rainy seasons.

name: Black Gram

name: Lentil

description: A winter pulse crop used for food and fodder, grows well in cool climates.

name: Cowpea

name: Kidney Bean

name: Soybean
description: A protein and oil rich crop used for food, feed, and processing.

name: Horse Gram
description: A drought-tolerant pulse crop grown in dry regions and poor soils.

name: Mustard
description: An oilseed crop grown in cool seasons, used for edible oil and spices.

name: Groundnut

name: Sunflower

description: An oilseed crop tolerant to drought, grown in dry rabi conditions.

name: Linseed
description: An oilseed crop grown in cool seasons, used for oil and nutrition.

name: Castor
description: An industrial oilseed crop used for lubricants and medicinal products.

name: Niger
description: A minor oilseed crop grown in hilly and tribal regions.

name: Coconut
description: A plantation crop grown in coastal areas, used for oil, water, and copra.

name: Oil Palm
description: A high-yield oil crop grown in humid tropics for edible and industrial oil.

name: Potato
description: A tuber crop grown in cool seasons, widely used as a staple vegetable.

name: Tomato
description: A popular vegetable crop grown widely, used fresh and in cooking.

description: A bulb vegetable grown in multiple seasons, important for culinary use.

name: Garlic
description: A bulb crop grown in cool seasons, valued for flavor and medicinal use.

name: Brinjal
description: A warm-season vegetable crop grown widely with many varieties.

name: Ladyfinger
description: A warm-season vegetable crop, easy to grow and widely consumed.

name: Cabbage
description: A cool-season leafy vegetable crop grown in winter.

description: A cool-season vegetable crop grown for edible curds.

description: A root vegetable crop grown in cool climates, rich in beta-carotene.

name: Radish
description: A fast-growing root vegetable suitable for cool seasons.

name: Spinach
description: A leafy vegetable grown quickly, rich in iron and vitamins.

name: Fenugreek
description: A leafy and seed spice crop grown in cool seasons.

name: Coriander
description: A herb and spice crop grown in cool seasons for leaves and seeds.

name: Chilli
description: A spice crop grown widely, used fresh and dried for flavor and heat.

description: A rhizome spice crop grown in warm humid climates, used for color and health.

name: Ginger

description: A temperate fruit crop grown in cool climates, needs chilling hours.

description: A vine fruit crop grown in warm dry climates, used fresh and for raisins.

description: A tropical fruit crop grown year-round, fast-growing and productive.

description: A tropical fruit crop grown in warm humid regions with well-drained soils.

description: A hardy fruit crop grown widely, known for high vitamin C content.

description: A drought-tolerant fruit crop grown in dry regions, valued for arils.

name: Watermelon
description: A summer fruit crop grown in warm weather, needs good irrigation.

description: A citrus crop grown widely, used for juice and flavoring.

description: A temperate fruit crop grown in cooler regions, produces juicy fruits.

description: A cool-season vegetable grown for crunchy stalks and aromatic leaves.

description: An aromatic herb grown for culinary and medicinal uses.
